name: Night Shooter
description:
This is the final project that I have done to finish my studies in Video Game Development and Virtual Reality.

Synopsis

The story is about the Agent, an expert in practically everything, the best in the agency.

His boss, "Boss", will send him on a dangerous mission to retrieve special skulls from an unknown enemy organization, which are the source of power for a massive weapon that will terrorize the world.

The game

As a project, the first scene is just the base with some interactions, and the boss to start the game.

In the game your only mission is to find and get the 5 skulls, you can die and not lose them, but your score up to the moment you get by killing your enemies will be lost.
